Our services

Now that you have already been through our escorts gallery you must be wondering about our escort service rates and charges. You must be worried about booking and charges for getting escort services in Kolkata. In this section of the website, we present to your our escort charges and booking. Since we have a wide variety of escorts to platter our elite and business class people we have a different rate card for each category. All escort charges are negotiable if you speak with our escort manager.

CHARGES AND BOOKING

OUR COMBO OFFERS

These call girls are very friendly and co-operative. In case you are looking for independent escorts or call girl services for a female casual encounter and regular dating we can also provide you with those girls. We can send girls at your place on your single call. Hence call or WhatsApp now. Please note to get a real image of our escort girls then you can contact our escort manager anytime. We are available24/7 in all 2/3/4/5 stars hotels.

YOUR SECURITY IS OUR PRIME FOCUS

We take complete responsibility of our client’s personal hygiene and security. For this, we arrange high-quality condoms and encourage the use of contraceptives to escort girls to avoid pregnancy. This ensures our clients for any privacy concerns and they can make their experience smooth and gentle. If you hire our escort girls your maximum physical satisfaction is guaranteed and we promise to make your evening or night pleasant.
